name: Trick or Treat! ^_^
description: Have you ever wanted to be able to go trick or treating whenever you wanted? Well you're in luck! Go trick or treating in your browser, for free!
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com https://apis.google.com; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://k-inc-232222.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com wss://*.firebaseio.com/;
